items.title: Salesforce Certified: Email Marketing
items.headline: Pass your Salesforce Email Marketing Specialist Certification Exam!  Learn SFMC Email Marketing & Automation Studio now.
objectives_summary: The benefit of this course is having an inside view into Marketing Cloud and all the necessary documentation organized by Study Guide topic.   The Salesforce Marketing Cloud isn’t a cloud that you can access via a demo account and there are not really any screenshots or videos of the interface that I could find.  I found not having a visual of the platform was challenging as I was studying for the exam.  So I’ve decided to bring it to you!

This course includes an inside view specifically of Email Studio, Automation Studio and Journey Builder.  As well, I’ve included links to the Salesforce Marketing documentation per topic so that you don’t waste time searching for it and it’s all organized for you.  By presenting this to you, you will be able to easily study and pass your Salesforce Email Marketing Cloud certification.

label.title: Salesforce Certified Marketing Cloud Email Specialist
